DeployEnvironment.description: A deployment's environment of the application.

imageURL.description:
Image URI of this app on the Container Registry.
- Combined from: `<registry-image-base-url>/<project-slug>/<app-name-slug>`
- If you build from the source code, don't specify `tag` at the end! (eg. `latest`, `beta`,...)

shouldInherit.description: Set to `false` if you DON'T want to inherit the Ingress YAML config from the previous deployment

redirect.description: Set to `false` if you don't want to redirect all the secondary domains to the primary domain.

basePath.description: Application base path in the endpoint URL

cdn.description: Flag to enable CDN for this application

tlsSecret.description:
Secret name to hold the key of SSL, will be automatically generated.
Only need to specify when using "custom" SSL (which is the SSL from third-party issuer)

prereleaseDeploymentYaml.description: Content of prerelease deployment YAML file

createdBy.description: User name of the first person who deploy on this environment.

lastUpdatedBy.description: User name of the last person who deploy or update this environment.

providerShortName.description: Short name of the cloud provider

projectID.description: [GOOGLE ONLY] Project ID of this cluster

primaryDomain.description: The PRIMARY domain of this cluster

primaryIP.description: The PRIMARY IP ADDRESS of this cluster

domains.description: Alternative domains or project's domains of this cluster

kubeConfig.description: The KUBECONFIG data to access to this cluster

serviceAccount.description: Content of the Service Account credentials to access this cluster

apiAccessToken.description: Content of the API ACCESS TOKEN to access this cluster

outputPath.description: Output path (include directory path + file name).

region.description: [GOOGLE CLOUD] Specify a region of your cluster

zone.description: [GOOGLE CLOUD] Specify a zone of your cluster

cluster.description: Cluster's short name. For deploy to specific cluster.

projectId.description:
ID of the {Project}
- [WARN] This is NOT a {PROJECT_ID} of Google Cloud platform!

deployYaml.description: Content of the deployment yaml (Namespace, Ingress, Service, Deploy,...)

shouldUseFreshDeploy.description:
! Should deploy app from a fresh namespace
## WARNING
- **With this flag enabled, the server will wipe out all current deployments within the target namespace, then deploy your app completely from scratch!**
- Use at your own risk, make sure you understand what you're doing, double check the namespace before deploying to avoid accidently take down other apps.

shouldEnableCDN.description: [Use when deploying an app] Should enable CDN for this app

shouldUploadDotenv.description: [Use when deploying an app] Force upload local DOTENV file to deployed environment.

shouldInstallPackage.description: Should install NPM packages locally after creating new project

shouldUseGit.description: Enable GIT when create new or initialize app

shouldUpdateCli.description: Should update CLI version before running the command

shouldShowInputOptions.default:
false
Should show input options while executing the command [for DEBUGGING]

skipCreatingDirectory.description: Should skip creating new directory while creating project

env.description:
Specify environment code:
- One of: `dev, prod, staging,...`

targetDirectory.description: Location where the CLI command point to.

isLocal.description: Define if the command was executed on local machine or server machine

tail.description: Print the logs and keep watching until the end

isTail.description: Follow the output logs until the command is finished.

InputOptions.description: Các giá trị đầu vào của CLI

get.description: Create new deploy environment of the application.

parameters.description: Deploy environment name
parameters.name: env

parameters.description: App slug
parameters.name: slug

post.description: Create new deploy environment of the application.

parameters.description: Disable the default `{$set: body}` of "update" query & update `{body}` directly to the items
parameters.name: raw

delete.description: Delete a deploy environment of the application.

slug.description: App's slug (no need `id` or `_id` if using `slug`)

id.description: [alias] App's ID (no need `slug` if using `id` or `_id`)

_id.description: App's ID (no need `slug` if using `id` or `_id`)

get.description: Get list of variables on the deploy environment of the application.

post.description: Create new variables on the deploy environment of the application.

parameters.description: Disable the default `{$set: body}` of "update" query & update `{body}` directly to the items
parameters.name: raw

envVars.description: Array of variables to be created on deploy environment

patch.description: Update a variable on the deploy environment of the application.

parameters.description: Disable the default `{$set: body}` of "update" query & update `{body}` directly to the items
parameters.name: raw

envVar.description: Array of variables to be created on deploy environment
